content: This contribution hasn’t received enough positive votes from the community. The "FASTEST" option has therefore been deactivated.
I slightly modified the last line in the description before giving final approval. It confused me on what the limit was for, and I didn't want that to slip attention by just commenting.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This uses cool math, the concepts are deep (memoization), yet it's simple to code.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice puzzle, not too simple since it needs memoization, solved this in Haskell last time it was posted.
